price: 44. Ce Rappel t’est certes destiné à toi et à ton peuple, et vous serez interrogés (à son sujet).
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
